cause.description:
World Vision ACT:S is a network of students committed to --
: Exploring what our faith says about poverty and injustice;
: Using creative activism to bring issues to life and change hearts on campuses;
: Using our voices to advocate with our government leaders to help end poverty, injustice, and human suffering.
1. Exploring what our faith says about poverty and injustice
2. Using creative activism to bring issues to life and change hearts on campuses
3. Using our voices to advocate with our government leaders to help end poverty, injustice, and human suffering
